name: js-utils
description: It's a JavaScript library that simplifies DOM manipulation, modeled after jQuery. With a lightweight and easy-to-use interface, it enables developers to easily select elements, handle events, and perform animations in the DOM with minimal code. Whether building a complex web app or a simple site, this library can help improve efficiency and focus on the code's logic and functionality rather than worrying about the details of DOM manipulation.

scripts.compile:win: rd /s /q "dist/lib" && npm run compile:es6 && npm run compile:es5
scripts.compile: rm -rf dist/lib && npm run compile:es6 && npm run compile:es5

author: Youssef Ameachaq
